data.title: Holland & Knight
data.meta_description: Holland & Knight's Miami office focuses on securities, trusts and estates, litigation, immigration, labor law, real estate and land use, and project finance.
data.text:
In planning a visit to our Miami office, we recommend the following transportation options:

Airport: Miami International Airport is located 6 miles from our office.

Public Transit: The closest Metrorail Stations are Vizcaya at 3201 SW 1st Avenue and Culmer at 701 NW 11th. Street Buses #95 and #24 stop on Brickell Avenue within 500 ft of our office building.

Parking: Parking is available in our building.

Before traveling, check the weather in Miami.

If you are planning a visit to our Miami office, nearby hotels include:
